ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:16}); // “Oh, so you're back?
I got something good for you.
Why don't you buy it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:2, dialog:17}); // {Cloud}
“You probably just found it
lying around somewhere, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:18}); // “I'll admit that I found it,
but you may never be able to
get another one like it again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // “Hey, much obliged.
You'll never regret it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // “Hmm, looks like you're
a little short, son.
Come back again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // “Hey, much obliged.
You'll never regret it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // “Hmm, looks like you're
a little short, son.
Come back again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // “Hmm, that's too bad.
This's really something.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // “You goin' up to the plate?
You better have batteries.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“You're gonna sell me
something you just found?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // “Hey, you knew?
I repaired them,
so it's all right.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Cloud}
“Why do I need batteries to
climb up to the plate?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // “You'll find out when you get there.
How 'bout 100 gil for each?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // “All right then, go see for yourself.
You'll be back again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // “Hmm, looks like you're
a little short, son.
Come back again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // “You want somethin'?
I don't wanna hear any complaints
'bout how things look.”

dialogStrings: Weapon Store

“You want somethin'?
I don't wanna hear any complaints
'bout how things look.”

“How 'bout it?
Wanna buy somethin'?”

“You goin' up to the plate?
You better have batteries.”

{Cloud}
“You're gonna sell me
something you just found?”

“Hey, you knew?
I repaired them,
so it's all right.”

{Cloud}
“Why do I need batteries to
climb up to the plate?”

“You'll find out when you get there.
How 'bout 100 gil for each?”

{Cloud}
“…”
{CHOICE}All right, I'll take them
{CHOICE}I think you're full of it

“All right then, go see for yourself.
You'll be back again.”

“Great!
How 'bout another one?”

{Cloud}
“…Hmm.”
{CHOICE}All right, I'll take 'em
{CHOICE}No, that's enough

“Huh?
Sorry, those were the last ones.”
Received "Batteries"!
“Come again.”

“Hmm, looks like you're
a little short, son.
Come back again.”

“Oh, so you're back?
I got something good for you.
Why don't you buy it?”

{Cloud}
“You probably just found it
lying around somewhere, right?”

“I'll admit that I found it,
but you may never be able to
get another one like it again.”
“How 'bout 129,000 gil for it?”

{Cloud}
“…What kind of price is that?”
{CHOICE}Oh, all right…I'll buy it
{CHOICE}No, I don't want it

“Hey, much obliged.
You'll never regret it!”

“Hmm, that's too bad.
This's really something.”
Received "Sneak Glove"!
